checkEmailAuthCode: Check the authentication code in your email.
agreePrivacyPolicy: Please accept the Privacy Policy of 4DReplay.
noWhiteSpace: This field should not contain any white spaces.
passwordNoWhiteSpace: Password should not contain any white spaces.
mustBe6Characters: The length of this field must be 6 digits.
autCodeMustBe6Characters: The length of auth code must be 6 digits.
tooShort8: This field must contain at least 8 characters.
passwordTooShort8: Password must contain at least 8 characters.
tooLong20: This field must be less than 20 characters.
passwordTooLong20: Password must be less than 20 characters.
invalidEmail: Please enter a valid email address.
tokenExpired: Loged out due to token expired.
canNotUseThisEmailIfLeaveThisPage: If you leave this page, you will not able to use this email to complete the sign up. Will you still leave this page?
